snippet: The biggest surprises were the awards for two online news outlets, a sign of the changing media landscape, and the lack of an award for fiction.
abstract: Pulitzer Prize winners are announced; the New York Times wins two prizes; David Kocieniewski wins for explanatory journalism; Jeffrey Gettleman wins for international reporting.
lead_paragraph: The biggest surprises were the awards for two online news outlets, a sign of the changing media landscape, and the lack of an award for fiction.

headline.seo: New York Times, Huffington Post and Politico Win Pulitzers
headline.main: 2 Pulitzers for Times; Huffington Post and Politico Win
headline.print_headline: 2 Pulitzers for Times; Huffington Post and Politico Win; No Award in Fiction
